We must remind Democrats that they do not speak for us and that they do not stand for us. They do not know the poverty in my hometown of North Charleston. Folks who grew up like me do not want a government handout or socialism. They want tools to succeed.
Democrats want to change the foundation of our great country but we cannot allow their socialist policies to destroy everything we stand for.
